meanings.definition: The action of setting something up or starting something.
meanings.sent1: The initializations of the new software were completed yesterday.
meanings.sent2: Software developers often perform initializations before starting a new project.
meanings.sent3: The initializations of the robot were so thorough that it started dancing on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the initializations of a bright idea, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The initializations of the plan were so clear that everyone knew what to do.

meanings.definition: The process of assigning an initial value to a variable.
meanings.sent1: During the initializations, the variable was set to zero.
meanings.sent2: In programming, initializations are crucial for defining the starting point of a variable.
meanings.sent3: The initializations of the variable felt like giving it a secret code to unlock its potential.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the initialization that sparked a chain reaction of success.
meanings.sent5: The initializations of the experiment parameters were carefully done to ensure accurate results.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or introducing something for the first time.
meanings.sent1: The initializations of the new product launch went smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Before the event, the team focused on the initializations to make a great first impression.
meanings.sent3: The initializations of the surprise party left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: His speech was the initialization of a new era in the company's history.
meanings.sent5: The initializations of the project brought excitement and anticipation to the team.
